site.title: LeadWise - Smart Lead Management System
site.description: Turn every lead into a meeting with an automated lead management system. Instant WhatsApp response, smart follow-up, and automatic calendar sync.

hero.title: The Shortest Path from Hot Lead to Booked Meeting
hero.subtitle: No WhatsApp ping-pong, no no-shows. Smart system that responds in seconds, warms up the client, and sends reminders until they show up. Everything works automatically, in real-time.

problem.title:
This isn't a marketing problem.
It's a handling problem.
problem.story: The campaign runs, leads sign up, but there's no one to answer them within seconds. Follow-up falls through. Clients book with competitors.
problem.impact:
Time = Money.
Unmanaged lead = deal going to someone else.

painPoints.title: Unable to Follow Up with Leads in Time
painPoints.description: The lead left their details, but by the time you got back to them, they've already forgotten who you are or why they reached out - or they've already closed with a competitor. Following up within an hour increases conversion chances by 500%.

painPoints.title: Leads No-Show to Meetings or Calls
painPoints.description: You set a time, cleared your calendar, but the other side simply doesn't show up or answer. Proper reminders and warming reduce no-show rates by 30%.

painPoints.title: Endless WhatsApp Ping-Pong to Schedule a Meeting
painPoints.description: Hours wasted on exhausting coordination attempts that end with "let's talk later". Since 80% of deals close only from the fifth contact onward, most of your money is simply falling through the cracks.

promise.title: Not a system. A machine.
promise.subtitle: For converting leads to calendar meetings - within 14 days

benefits.title: Instant WhatsApp Response
benefits.description: Catch the lead while they're "hot" - the system sends a personal message the second their details are submitted - exactly when the customer is most interested and focused on finding a solution. We lock in the connection immediately and direct them straight to booking a meeting.

benefits.title: Automatic Meeting Scheduling
benefits.description: End the era of ping-pong with "when's good for you?" messages. The lead chooses their own time slot in your calendar from a link sent automatically, saving you hours of chasing and coordinating

benefits.title: Reminders and Warming
benefits.description: Ensuring they actually show up - once a meeting is booked, the system sends a series of reminders and value (like a short video) that create commitment in the customer and reduce no-show rates by 30%.

benefits.title: Smart Follow-up
benefits.description: Consistency until full maturity - the system manages the connection for you with varied messages that keep you top of mind. We ensure every lead reaches the sales stage, without you having to chase them manually.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Automatic mechanism that takes care of the lead from registration to the meeting

steps.title: Lead Signs Up - The Machine Kicks In
steps.description: The moment details are submitted, a personal WhatsApp message is sent within seconds. We catch them while they're "hot" and offer them to book a meeting immediately in your calendar.

steps.title: Didn't Book? We Don't Give Up
steps.description: This is where most deals fall through, but not with us. The system identifies who didn't book and starts a series of smart follow-up messages that provide value and remind them why they reached out - until they're ready to book.

steps.title: Booked a Meeting? We Make Sure They Show Up
steps.description: Once a time is booked in the calendar, the lead gets confirmation and a series of automatic reminders. They arrive at the meeting already knowing you, understanding your value, and ready to talk business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you wanted to know about LeadWise

items.question: How long does it take to set up the system?
items.answer: The setup process takes between 7-14 business days. This includes a strategy session, script writing, technical integration, CRM setup, and comprehensive training.

items.question: What do I need for the system to work?
items.answer: You need a business WhatsApp number, a Cal.com or Google Calendar account, and of course - leads coming to your website or forms. We handle everything else for you.

items.question: Is there a monthly cost?
items.answer: The initial investment is a one-time payment of $799. After that, there's a monthly cost of approximately $20-40 for third-party technical tools: CRM system for lead management, automation tools, WhatsApp messaging, and your own private domain. The exact cost depends on your usage volume and chosen plan.

items.question: Is the system suitable for any type of business?
items.answer: The system is especially suitable for meeting-based businesses - consultants, service firms, salespeople, agents, and more. If you're based on calls or meetings with clients - this system is perfect for you.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: In the first meeting, we check compatibility. If the system doesn't fit you - we simply don't proceed. But if we start working - we're committed to your success.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
items.answer: Not at all! The system is installed for you from A to Z. You receive simple and convenient training, and all routine operation is simple and easy.

items.question: How many leads do I need per month?
items.answer: The system can handle any number of leads - from 10 leads per month to hundreds. It's built according to your volume.

items.question: I have more questions, how do I contact you?
items.answer: The easiest way - click the 'Schedule Your Free Strategy Session' button and let's schedule a short call. We'll answer all questions and check together if the system fits you.
